A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
An average random sci fi movie which is full of plot holes and silly humour. That's okay\, right? Oh wait\, is a star wars movie? Are you sure? No way. It's a parody movie\, surely.
Oh...
Don't worry guys\, they covered up the average turd with Star Wars soundtrack and imagery to fool the mainstream into liking it.
Had you removed all Star Wars aspects not only would you never associate it with Star wars\, it would have been a better film. Instead it just shits all over its decades long fanbase. Because people hated the prequels so why even try?
